amendment.description: Amendment inserts language into the bill directing the Architect of the Capitol to submit reports on the financial administration and cost recovery of activites described in the bill with respect to a given fiscal year to the Committee on House Administration.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to amend a section of the bill direction the Architect of the Capitol to submit a report on the financial administration and cost recovery of activites described in said section with respect to that fiscal year to the Committee on House Administration.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Lungren, Daniel E. amendment (A001) Agreed to without objection.

action.text: Amendment (A001) offered by Mr. Lungren, Daniel E..
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A001) offered by Mr. Lungren, Daniel E..
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Lungren, Daniel E. amendment (A001) Agreed to without objection.
Amendment agreed to by House: On agreeing to the Lungren, Daniel E. amendment (A001) Agreed to without objection.
